description: Main frontend component (App.js) for a web application that manages theme switching and file uploads with backend integration.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main React functional component managing theme and file upload UI.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Switches between light and dark themes.

methods.name: handleFileSelected
methods.description: Handles the uploaded or dropped file, manages upload progress and result.

methods.name: onFileChange
methods.description: Handles file selection from file input.

methods.name: onDragOver
methods.description: Handles drag over event to activate drag area.

methods.name: onDragLeave
methods.description: Handles drag leave event to deactivate drag area.

methods.name: onDrop
methods.description: Handles file drop event to trigger upload.

methods.name: renderUploadArea
methods.description: Renders the file upload UI area.
